TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeoCoordinateWatcher extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged, class System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher`1<class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, class System.IDisposable
Public Class GeoCoordinateWatcher Implements IDisposable, IGeoPositionWatcher(Of GeoCoordinate), INotifyPropertyChanged
type GeoCoordinateWatcher = class interface IDisposable interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface IGeoPositionWatcher<GeoCoordinate>

summary.span: 提供基于纬度和经度坐标的位置数据。

span.span: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了基于坐标的位置数据来自当前位置提供程序。The class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider. 当前的位置提供程序会优先最高的计算机上，基于许多因素影响，如年龄和准确性的所有提供程序中的数据由位置应用程序请求的准确性以及功率消耗和性能影响与位置提供程序相关联。The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 随着时间推移，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号功能和 Wi-fi 三角化提供程序将成为最准确的提供程序计算机上可能会更改当前的位置提供程序。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 若要开始访问位置的数据，创建并调用或启动获取来自当前位置提供程序的数据。To begin accessing location data, create a and call or to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 属性可以进行检查，以确定数据是否可用。The property can be checked to determine if data is available. 从一次数据是否可用，你都可以获取位置属性，或通过处理接收连续位置更新事件。If data is available, you can get the location one time from the property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the event. ， ，和属性支持，以便应用程序可以数据绑定到这些属性。The , , and properties support , so that an application can data-bind to these properties. 在 Windows 7 中，所有类都可以完全正常运行，如果安装位置提供程序，并能够解析计算机的位置。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 7 简易版，唯一支持的位置提供程序是默认位置中的提供程序 Control Panel 中，和外接程序必须要安装指定纬度和经度。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude. **请注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，在以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以创建具有构造函数的对象，但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 所指示的位置属性将始终为。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 将不引发任何位置事件。No location events will be raised. ## Examples 以下程序演示如何创建和开始通过使用初始化超时值获取数据。The following program shows how to create a and start acquiring data by using an initialization timeout. 如果已知，则代码然后将打印中的位置的坐标。The code then prints the coordinates of the location, if known. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/cs/getlocationdatasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/vb/GetLocationDataSync.vb#1)] 以下程序演示如何通过订阅到接收连续位置更新事件。The following program shows how to receive continuous location updates by subscribing to events. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/cs/getlocationdataasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/vb/GetLocationDataAsync.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MovementThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MovementThreshold : double with get, set

summary.span: 相对于最后一个 事件中的坐标必须移动的距离（以米为单位），移动该距离之后位置提供程序将引发另一个 事件。

span.span: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last event, before the location provider raises another event.
Distance, in meters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认移动阈值为零，这意味着，任何更改在由当前的位置提供程序原因检测到的位置事件和中的更新属性。The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a event and an update in the property. > [!NOTE] > 将所请求的阈值在接收事件时，移动阈值不能保证。The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold. 该平台将尝试接受请求某个特定移动阈值，但不是会在某些情况下，事件引发在请求的阈值。The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold. **请注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，在以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以创建具有构造函数的对象，但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 所指示的位置属性将始终为。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 将不引发任何位置事件。No location events will be raised. 下图表示位置提供程序 （例如，GPS 设备） 提供到计算机的位置坐标。The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer. P1、 在关系图中，表示中包括的位置数据事件，和 P2、 P3 和 P4 表示在移动的阈值内的点。P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold. 因此，当位置提供程序提供数据，该值指示在这些点 （P1、 P2、 P3、 和 P4） 的某个位置不引发的事件，和返回 P1。So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no events are raised, and returns P1. 点 P5 是外部距离，因此在该点，更新和引发事件。The point P5 is outside of the distance, so at that point, is updated and a event is raised. ![演示 movementthreshold 的关系的关系图](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "关系图演示 movementthreshold 的关系")![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 距离移动由于的最后一个事件超出指定阈值时，仅将引发此事件。This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by . 传递给事件处理程序对象包括包含更新的位置数据的对象。The object passed to the event handler includes the object that contains the updated location data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理第一个事件。The following example shows how to handle the first event. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/cs/locationevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/vb/locationevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始从当前位置提供程序获取数据。

span.span: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法启用 事件并允许访问 属性。

span.span: This method enables events and allows access to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将启动获取来自当前位置提供程序的数据。Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 选择当前的位置提供程序基于因素，如年龄和来自所有提供程序、 请求的应用程序或应用程序和设备的功率消耗的准确性和与位置提供程序关联的性能影响数据的准确性.The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 随着时间推移，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号功能和 Wi-fi 三角化提供程序将成为最准确的提供程序计算机上可能会更改当前的位置提供程序。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 如果当前设置优先级位置提供程序没有数据时方法被调用时，它将开始获取的数据。If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the method is called, it will start to acquire data. 如果权限已被授予到客户端，当数据变为可用时，数据可以同步，访问，并且如果正在处理事件以异步方式传递。If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果禁用了 Windows 7 传感器和位置平台时调用时，将立即返回，不会引发事件，并通过返回的位置属性将包含.If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when is called, will immediately return, events will not be raised, and the location returned by the property of will contain . 如果当前的按优先级排列的位置提供确实具有数据，它将立即可用同步，并将以异步方式传递，如果正在处理事件。If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果调用应用程序不具有访问位置提供程序中的数据的权限，则将对话框中，若要授予或拒绝权限提示用户。If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission. 将无模式对话框。The dialog box will be modeless. ## Examples 下面的程序处理后发生的第一个位置更新调用。The following program handles the first location update that occurs after is called. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/cs/getlocationdataupdateonce.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/vb/GetLocationDataUpdateOnce.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始从当前位置提供程序获取数据。

span.span: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法同步返回。

span.span: This method returns synchronously.

returns.span: 如果在 指定的时间内开始数据获取，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻止调用线程执行期间指定的时间段内`timeout`。This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`. 在调用时要格外小心从你的应用程序用户界面线程。Use caution when calling from the user interface thread of your application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用。The following example demonstrates how to call .
